briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of this class.

detaileddescription.para: When CommentRangeEnd is created, it belongs to the specified document, but is not yet part of the document and ParentNode is null.
To append a CommentRangeEnd to the document use InsertAfter or InsertBefore on the paragraph where you want the comment inserted.
For more info see the Visitor design pattern.

briefdescription.para: Specifies the identifier of the comment to which this region is linked to.
Denotes the end of a region of text that has a comment associated with it.

detaileddescription.para: To create a comment anchored to a region of text, you need to create a Comment and then create CommentRangeStart and CommentRangeEnd and set their identifiers to the same Id value.
CommentRangeEnd is an inline-level node and can only be a child of Paragraph.
